text:
[Verse]
Underneath the moonlit skies
Stars are shining in your eyes
Dreams take flight and hearts arise
Whispered hopes won’t disguise

[Verse 2]
Neon lights and city streets
Endless nights and dancing feet
Find the rhythm feel the beat
In the magic we will meet

[Chorus]
Starlit dreams just you and me
In this moment we are free
Feel the night’s electric sea
Together in our fantasy

[Bridge]
Every step in time we glide
Side by side our hearts won’t hide
Hold my hand let’s take this ride
In the stars our love’s our guide

[Verse 3]
Fireworks above so high
Colors burst across the sky
We will never say goodbye
In each other’s arms we’ll fly

[Chorus]
Starlit dreams just you and me
In this moment we are free
Feel the night’s electric sea
Together in our fantasy
title: Starlit Dreams
